[Generate authentication credentials](../../../../README.md#authentication). 2. Setup Python environment. 1. Install and activate python 3.6+. If you're using [pyenv](https://github.com/pyenv/pyenv): ```sh pyenv install 3.9.7 pyenv shell 3.9.7 ``` 2. (optional) [Install poetry](https://python-poetry.org/docs/#installation). 3. [Install dependencies](#installation). 4.
